name: Time

properties1.name: name
properties1.description: (mandatory) is the unique name of the field.

properties2.name: label
properties2.description: (mandatory) (translatable) is the descriptive title of the field.

properties4.name: description
properties4.description: (optional) (translatable) is text that will be shown as a tooltip when the user moves the mouse over the drop-down box.

properties5.name: class
properties5.description: (optional) is a CSS class name for the HTML form field. If omitted this will default to 'text_area'.

properties6.name: required
properties6.description: (optional) The field must be filled before submitting the form.

properties7.name: min
properties7.description: (optional) The allowable minimal value of the field in seconds.

properties8.name: max
properties8.description: (optional) The allowable maximal value of the field in seconds.

properties9.name: step
properties9.description: (optional) The steps between different values in seconds.

properties10.name: showon
properties10.description: (optional) show this field on the bases of the value in another field. https://joomla.stackexchange.com/a/17682/2166

description: The time form field type provides a select list of integers with specified first, last and step values.
